items.title: Easy & Free
items.description: No registration, no payment - just send audio to the Telegram bot and get results

items.text: Transcription completely changed my approach to learning English. Before, I often couldn't understand what native speakers were saying — everything blended into one stream. But when I started listening to audio with transcription, words and expressions began forming into understandable phrases. I started noticing how sentences are built, how real conversational expressions are used. This gave me confidence and greatly improved my listening comprehension. Now I don't just listen — I truly understand.
items.author: Elena

items.text: I often record interviews on a voice recorder — and transcription used to take tons of time and nerves. With transcription everything became easier: I upload audio and in a minute I have ready text. This really saves me, especially when deadlines are tight. Plus it's convenient to reread and find the right quotes. Now I spend more time on the essence — not on rewinding recordings back and forth.
items.author: Maria

items.text: At work I often receive voice messages, which isn't always convenient — especially during meetings or in noisy places. Transcription became a real lifesaver: I can quickly read the essence without spending time listening. Plus it helps me better understand business English.
items.author: David

cta.title: Ready to try AudioTextAI?
